entity.name: Andrew Cuomo
entity.description: Governor of New York, Andrew Cuomo

text: @NYGovCuomo Gov. I am so proud of you and your team and how you handled the Covid-19 crisis. We New Yorkers did our part with your strong leadership and guidance. I'm a life long Long Islander, live 3 miles from where I was born and I'm never leaving NY. Greatest State in the Union.
